mapper.select: SELECT mb_num, mb_uid, mb_nickname, mb_pw, mb_email, mb_rol, mb_score, mb_photo_ver, mb_agree, IFNULL(mb_provider, 'local') as mb_provider FROM member WHERE mb_uid = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mb_uid, mb_nickname, mb_pw, mb_email, mb_agree, mb_rol, mb_score) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{agree}, 'USER', 0)
mapper.select: SELECT mb_num, mb_uid, mb_nickname, mb_pw, mb_email, mb_rol, mb_score, mb_photo_ver, mb_agree, IFNULL(mb_provider, 'local') as mb_provider FROM member WHERE mb_uid = #{kakaoUid} LIMIT 1

mapper.select: SELECT mb_photo_data as photoData, mb_photo_type as photoType FROM member WHERE mb_uid = #{id} AND mb_photo_data IS NOT NULL
